title: BANDS x AIML Collab P1 – How to Build an ML Portfolio
description: Join a special collaboration between BANDS and AIML for How to Build an ML Portfolio 101 – Part 1 of a two-part series.

overview.definition: Learn how to build a machine learning portfolio through practical projects and collaborations.

tutorials.title: Portfolio Tools Overview
tutorials.description: Explore ML tools like GitHub, Kaggle, and practical documentation.

applications: Showcase your ML skills through hands-on projects.
tips: Use GitHub and Kaggle to showcase practical skills.
Break your portfolio into small, achievable milestones.
